feed.title: French Reproducibility Network
feed.subtitle: A national peer-led consortium for the promotion and dissemination of reproducible research.

entry.title: Creation of the French Reproducibility Network

link.title: Creation of the French Reproducibility Network

entry.content: We are very happy to announce the official creation of the French Reproducibility Network. If you’re interested to join the network, just drop us an email.
entry.summary: We are very happy to announce the official creation of the French Reproducibility Network. If you’re interested to join the network, just drop us an email.
